# Repository Inventory

*Generated by Inventory Agent on 2026-02-06*

## Root Directory (`./`)

| File | Type | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| `./README.md` | Documentation | Main project documentation, setup instructions, and architecture overview. |
| `./package.json` | Configuration | Node.js project manifest. Defines dependencies (`express`, `genkit`, `lancedb`, etc.) and scripts. |
| `./package-lock.json` | Configuration | Dependency lock file. |
| `./.env` | Configuration | Environment variables (sensitive). |
| `./.env.example` | Configuration | Template for environment variables. |
| `./.gitignore` | Configuration | Git ignore rules. |
| `./index.html` | Source | HTML entry point (likely for standalone usage). |
| `./manifest.json` | Configuration | Web app manifest. |
| `./sw.js` | Source | Service Worker script. |
| `./seed_tasks.js` | Script | Database seeding script for tasks. |
| `./remote_error.json` | Data | Error log or configuration (purpose inferred). |

## Scripts (`./scripts/`)

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `./scripts/deploy.js` | Deployment script (referenced in `package.json`). |
| `./scripts/capture-sync-ui.js` | UI capture synchronization script. |
| `./scripts/check-graph-connection.js` | Utility to verify graph database connection. |
| `./scripts/debug-remote-deploy.js` | Debugging tool for remote deployment issues. |
| `./scripts/env-check.js` | Environment variable validation script. |
| `./scripts/simulate-sonia-response.js` | Simulation script for "Sonia" agent responses. |
| `./scripts/verify-orchestration.js` | Integration test for agent orchestration. |
| `./scripts/verify-ui.js` | UI verification script. |

## Modules (`./src/`)

| Directory | Purpose | Key Entry File(s) |
|-----------|---------|-------------------|
| `./src/api/` | Defines Express routes and API endpoints. | `./src/api/routes.js` |
| `./src/connectors/` | External service integration (likely mocks/stubs). | `./src/connectors/MockConnectors.js` |
| `./src/genkit/` | Core AI logic including agents, flows, orchestration, and persona management. | `./src/genkit/config.js`, `./src/genkit/persona.js` |
| `./src/storage/` | Data persistence and storage logic. | `./src/storage/BrainStorage.js` |

## Frontend

| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `./index.html` | **Entry Point**. Main application HTML file. imports `frontend/SecondBrain.js`. |
| `./frontend/SecondBrain.js` | Core frontend application logic (ES6 Module). Exports `secondBrain` singleton. |
| `./frontend/ApiClient.js` | Handles API communication. |

**Frontend Notes:**
- **Type**: Vanilla JS (ES6 Modules). No build step required generally (unless deployment specific).
- **Framework**: None (Vanilla DOM manipulation).
- **Entry**: `index.html` loads module directly.
